item.description:
Ok gang, it's time to get our culture ON. Amy Schlegel is celebrating three new exhibits at the Tufts University Art Gallery including:

Sacred Monster: Everyday animism in Contemporary Japanese Art and Anime

Brian Knep's Exempla, Six related, interactive projections that use animated, child-like drawing to examine, in a humorous way, the illusions that drive us.

Tadashi Moriyama's Flight Home.
item.name: Tufts Art Gallery's Public Opening Reception
